This guide is a comprehensive resource for contributors (from all levels, beginners, intermediate, and seasoned) to the R project, facilitating their onboarding and helping them navigate the contribution process. [...] R Contribution Working Group This guide draws on documentation and articles written by the R Core Team. The first version of the guide was heavily influenced by the Python Developerâ€™s Guide. Initial chapters of the guide were developed by Saranjeet Kaur Bhogal, in a project funded by the R Foundation, mentored by Heather Turner and Michael Lawrence. This initial version was ...
